title: loginChatGptComplete
description: Codex server notification sent when ChatGPT login completes (JSON-RPC notification params).

loginId.description: Identifier of the ChatGPT login flow

success.description: Indicates whether the ChatGPT login succeeded

error.description: Optional error message when the login fails

timestamp.description: Time when the login attempt completed

response.description: Notifications do not include a response payload
